about_the_game:
Welcome to WATTGAMES.

A revolution in fitness gaming, WATTGAMES is the first-ever indoor cycling game where your power fuels epic battles against fearsome enemies. Ride through the beautifully crafted world of Season 1 - The Apprentice Trials, taking on intense missions to rescue the Kingdom of Velaryn from the Beasts of the Rift.

Designed from the ground up for indoor training, WATTGAMES merges immersive gameplay with realistic cycling mechanics to deliver engaging and rewarding workouts. Every pedal stroke sparks new adventure, with your effort shaping the battles ahead and the fate of the Kingdom. Earn your victories.

WATTGAMES is compatible with most FTMS-enabled smart trainers. Currently, power and cadence are required to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 11/10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K | AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070, 8 GB | AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56, 8 GB

short_description: Turn your indoor cycling into an adventure! A new revolution in fitness gaming, WATTGAMES is the first-ever indoor cycling game that lets you do battle with fearsome enemies, explore a beautifully crafted world and complete missions through exercise. Ride for your life!
